oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gertrude Bugler to Thomas Hardy — Thanks for birthday books, 8 March 1925
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gertrude Bugler
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Manuscript note; violet ink on paper; 2 written pages (5 images incl. blanks)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bugler thanks Hardy for birthday copies of The Woodlanders, says she will always value the books, and is relieved he is not annoyed about the Haymarket matinees.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:provenance: Held by Dorset History Centre / Dorset Museum.
oai_dc:dc.dcterms:rights: Rights status uncertain; consult holding repository.
